data.title: huge burger
data.text: The teriyaki burger is probably the best drive through burger in town. and the curly fries are enough to make you die and go to heaven. The atmosphere is nostalgic and reminds me of being a younger kid and walking to the local drive through to get ice cream. The menu is huge! i can't wait to try it all.

data.title: downtown delight
data.text: love visiting the red room every now and again. the value and service have always been acceptable, there is nothing particularly memorable about this place but no bad memories have been had here, at least by us!

data.title: Just a Bar... with Rock Music and Velvet Paintings
data.text: I've never been much of a bar-hopper so maybe I missing the point about this place, but it seemed to be just like all the other places I've been.  This one just had rock music and velvet paintings on wall instead.
